sentences.sContent: He thought that it must be worth billions.
sentences.sCn: 他认为它一定值亿万元。

sentences.sContent: The Ethiopian foreign debt stands at 3 billion dollars.
sentences.sCn: 埃塞俄比亚的外债达30亿美元。

words.tran: 十亿分之一的；第十亿的

trans.tranOther: You can also use billions as a pronoun.
A billion is a thousand million.
